com.communote.server.api.core.property

Interface PropertyManagement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PropertyManagementImpl

    public interface PropertyManagement
    This service provides means to create, read, update and remove properties including the generic binary property and the properties which are associated with an object like a note or a user.

    When accessing properties a filter is applied on the group and key to decide whether the property is accessible. Only properties whose group and key were registered with addObjectPropertyFilter(PropertyType, String, String) will be accessible.

    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String KEY_GROUP
      Common key group for internal properties.

      • addObjectPropertyFilter

        void addObjectPropertyFilter(PropertyType propertyType,
                             String keyGroup,
                             String propertyKey)
        Add a combination of a property key group and property key to the accessible properties of the given property type.
        Parameters:
        propertyType - the property type
        keyGroup - the key group of the property
        propertyKey - the key of the property

      • getAllObjectProperties

        Set<StringPropertyTO> getAllObjectProperties(PropertyType propertyType,
                                             Long objectId)
                                      throws NotFoundException,
                                             AuthorizationException
        Get all filtered properties from a given object for the given property type
        Parameters:
        propertyType - the property type
        objectId - the object id
        Returns:
        all filtered properties from the object
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the user is not allowed to access the properties of the object
        NotFoundException - in case the object does not exist

      • getBinaryProperty

        BinaryProperty getBinaryProperty(String keyGroup,
                                 String key)
        Get a binary property not bound to any context
        Parameters:
        keyGroup - the key group
        key - the key of the property
        Returns:
        the property (or null)

      • getBinaryPropertyLastModificationDate

        Date getBinaryPropertyLastModificationDate(String keyGroup,
                                           String key)
        Get last modification date of a binary property.
        Parameters:
        keyGroup - group of the property key
        key - the key of the property
        Returns:
        the last modification date or null if the property does not exist

      • getGlobalObjectProperty

        StringProperty getGlobalObjectProperty(PropertyType propertyType,
                                       Long objectId,
                                       String key)
                                throws NotFoundException,
                                       AuthorizationException
        Get a global property which is a property with the predefined key group "global"
        Parameters:
        propertyType - the type of property
        objectId - the id of the object to get the property for
        key - the key of the property
        Returns:
        the property (or null)
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case there is no object of the given property type and id
        AuthorizationException - in case the user is not allowed to access the properties of the object

      • getObjectProperty

        StringProperty getObjectProperty(PropertyType propertyType,
                                 Long objectId,
                                 String keyGroup,
                                 String key)
                          throws NotFoundException,
                                 AuthorizationException
        Get an object property
        Parameters:
        propertyType - the type of property
        objectId - the ID of the object whose property should be retrieved
        keyGroup - the key group of the property
        key - the key of the property
        Returns:
        the property or null if there is no such property or the key and group combination is not in the allowed filters
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case there is no object of the given property type and id
        AuthorizationException - in case the user is not allowed to access the properties of the object

      • getObjectPropertyUnfiltered

        StringProperty getObjectPropertyUnfiltered(PropertyType propertyType,
                                           Long objectId,
                                           String keyGroup,
                                           String key)
                                    throws NotFoundException,
                                           AuthorizationException
        Get an object property. The filter of will not be applied.
        Parameters:
        propertyType - the type of property
        objectId - the ID of the object whose property should be retrieved
        keyGroup - the key group of the property
        key - the key of the property
        Returns:
        the property or null if there is no such property
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case there is no object of the given property type and id
        AuthorizationException - in case the user is not allowed to access the properties of the object

      • getUsersOfProperty

        <T> Collection<T> getUsersOfProperty(Long noteId,
                                     String keyGroup,
                                     String key,
                                     String value,
                                     Converter<User,T> converter)
                              throws NotFoundException,
                                     AuthorizationException
        Return the users that have a specific note property set for a note. The found users are converted into the target type of the provided converter. Deleted users won't be included.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the target type of the conversion
        Parameters:
        noteId - the ID of the note for which the users that have the property should be returned
        keyGroup - the group key of the searched property
        key - the group of the searched property
        value - the value of the searched property
        converter - the converter to convert the found users
        Returns:
        the found users or an empty list
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case the note does not exist
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not allowed to read the property

      • hasBinaryProperty

        boolean hasBinaryProperty(String keyGroup,
                          String key)
        Test whether a binary property exists.
        Parameters:
        keyGroup - the key group
        key - the key of the property
        Returns:
        True, if this property exists.

      • hasUserNoteProperty

        boolean hasUserNoteProperty(Long noteId,
                            String keyGroup,
                            String key,
                            String value)
                     throws NotFoundException,
                            AuthorizationException
        Test whether the current user has a given property for a note.
        Parameters:
        noteId - the ID of the note for which the existence of the property should be checked
        keyGroup - the group key of the searched property
        key - the group of the searched property
        value - the value of the searched property
        Returns:
        true if the user has the property otherwise false
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not allowed to read the property
        NotFoundException - in case the note does not exist

      • removeBinaryProperty

        void removeBinaryProperty(String keyGroup,
                          String propertyKey)
        Remove a binary property.
        Parameters:
        keyGroup - The group of the property key.
        propertyKey - The properties key.

        keyGroup - the key group of the property
        propertyKey - the key of the property

                                throws NotFoundException,
                                       AuthorizationException
        Set a global property which is a property with the predefined key group will be "global".
        Parameters:
        propertyType - the type of property
        objectId - the id of the object to set the property for
        key - the key of the property
        value - the value to set
        Returns:
        the property
        Throws:

        AuthorizationException - in case the user is not allowed to access the properties of the object

      • setObjectProperties

        void setObjectProperties(PropertyType propertyType,
                         Long objectId,
                         Set<StringPropertyTO> properties)
                  throws NotFoundException,
                         AuthorizationException
        Set several properties of an object.
        Parameters:
        propertyType - the type of property
        objectId - the id of the object to set the property for
        properties - Set of transfer objects describing the new properties or property values
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case there is no object of the given property type and id
        AuthorizationException - in case the user is not allowed to access the properties of the object

      • setObjectProperty

        StringProperty setObjectProperty(PropertyType propertyType,
                                 Long objectId,
                                 String keyGroup,
                                 String key,
                                 String value)
                          throws NotFoundException,
                                 AuthorizationException
        Set a new value of a property. If the property does not exist it will be created and assigned to the object. If the value to set is null, an existing property will be removed. In case the property does not exist nothing will happen.
        Parameters:
        propertyType - the type of property
        objectId - the id of the object to set the property for
        keyGroup - the key group of the property
        key - the key of the property
        value - the value to set. Can be null to remove an existing property.
        Returns:
        the created or modified property. Can be null if the value was null and the property did not exist.
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case there is no object of the given property type and id
        AuthorizationException - in case the user is not allowed to access the properties of the object
